entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 10:08 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:08 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 10:08 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
